Sales Service API Documentation

This document provides an overview of the Sales Service API.

Classes and Methods

DisplayGoods Class

The DisplayGoods class handles retrieving all available goods for sale.

GetGoodDetails Class

The GetGoodDetails class handles fetching the details of a specific good.

MakeSale Class

The MakeSale class handles making a sale, checking customer balance, and updating stock.

GetPurchaseHistory Class

The GetPurchaseHistory class handles fetching a customer’s purchase history.
